amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the access to primary health care of veterans living in rural and highly rural areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2182 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2182 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14520-14524; text: CR S14521) To express the sense of the Senate on the access to primary health care of veterans living in rural and highly rural areas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2182 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2182 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 2150.
